body.p: James H. Orr, Esq. of this County has recently joined the Confederate army, and is no longer a citizen of this County -- Consequently, his office of Justice of the peace of Nicholas County, is vacated -- He has also requested me to tender you his resignation, for him, which I now do --

The neighbors of 'Squire Orr desire that his borther, Oscar F. Orr, be appointed in his place, and I have no doubt he is the Choice of the district -- and they have requested me to recommend him to you -- Mr. Orr is a gentleman of good Sense, well qualified for the office, and I hope you -- will appoint, and that you will do so at an early day, as he will be needed at our approaching -- Court of Claims.

Very respectfully
Wm. Nowell, as Judge of the Nicholas County Court.

Nicholas Co
J. P.
Com. Issd Augt. 30. 1861
